query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users) as total_users,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients) as total_patients,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM appointments) as total_appointments,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM documents) as total_documents,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sessionRecords) as total_sessions,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attendance) as total_attendance,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_data) as total_patient_data;

-- Listar usuários restantes
SELECT id, name, email, role FROM users ORDER BY id;

-- Listar pacientes restantes
SELECT id, name, diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY id;
